body_html:
well the only different part of success and fail version are the size of the weight (6 line)
and i'm sure i did it correct but i can still post my code here
https://gist.github.com/B3N50N/aafd02d4c70cc7d24ce45c5fe472555f
also one more thing is that if the error come out at the begging of the program run than it's probably my problem，it seam's it'll check every line of code before init , but what happened to me is the error come out after 30 minuet the program has start it mean it has pass the first check，but fail when it was initializing .
and also in the error logs you can see the error comes out with Adam or something it mean it has already successful build the forward propagation ，the error bump out while building backward propagation.

body:
well the only different part of success and fail version are the size of the weight (6 line)
and i'm sure i did it correct but i can still post my code here
https://gist.github.com/B3N50N/aafd02d4c70cc7d24ce45c5fe472555f
also one more thing is that if the error come out at the begging of the program run than it's probably my problem，it seam's it'll check every line of code before init , but what happened to me is the error come out after 30 minuet the program has start it mean it has pass the first check，but fail when it was initializing .
and also in the error logs you can see the error comes out with Adam or something it mean it has already successful build the forward propagation ，the error bump out while building backward propagation.
